required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Examination of a Weight Loss Formula on Health
clinical_study.official_title: An Examination of a Novel Weight Loss Formula on Anthropometry and Indices of Cardiovascular Disease Risk

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to examine a novel weight loss formula with and without common stimulants on anthropometry and indices of cardiovascular disease risk.

detailed_description.textblock: Obesity remains a problem for overall health and risk for cardiovascular disease worldwide. While dietary modification and increased levels of physical activity remain steadfast recommendations, alternative strategies related to supplementation remain an interest for the general populace and medical communities. A potential objection to the use of dietary supplements is that they often contain stimulants designed to increase metabolism. However, consumers and health practitioners alike are wary of such formulae; hence, the continued investigation of non-stimulant supplements is warranted. Therefore the aim of this study is to examine a novel weight loss formula with and without common stimulants on anthropometry and indices of cardiovascular disease risk.

primary_outcome.description: Changes in body weight (kg) analyzed with related body composition variables via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

Changes in fat mass (kg) analyzed with related body composition variables via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

Changes in body fat (%) analyzed with related body composition variables via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Body Composition - Lean Tissue Mass
secondary_outcome.description: Change in lean tissue mass (kg) analyzed with related body composition outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Body Composition - Bone Mass
secondary_outcome.description: Change in bone mass (g) analyzed with related body composition outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Body Composition - Fat Free Mass
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in fat free mass (sum of lean tissue mass and bone mass expressed in kg) analyzed with related body composition variables via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Body Composition - Total Body Water
secondary_outcome.description: Change in total body water (L and %) and analyzed with related body composition outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Resting Energy Expenditure - Caloric Expenditure
secondary_outcome.description: Change in resting energy expenditure expressed in absolute (kcals/d) and relative terms (kcals/kg/day) and analyzed with related resting energy expenditure outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Resting Energy Expenditure - Respiratory Exchange Ratio
secondary_outcome.description: Change in resting respiratory exchange ratio (RER) as an indicator of carbohydrate and fat oxidation analyzed with related resting energy expenditure outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Anthropometric Measures - Waist Circumference
secondary_outcome.description: Change in waist circumference (cm) analyzed with related anthropometric outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Anthropometric Measures - Hip Circumference
secondary_outcome.description: Change in hip circumference (cm) analyzed with related anthropometric outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Anthropometric Measures - Waist to Hip Ratio
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the ratio of waist to hip (waist / hip circumference) analyzed with related anthropometric outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Anthropometric Measures - Body Mass Index
secondary_outcome.description: Change in body mass index (kg of body mass / height in meters squared) analyzed with related anthropometric outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Dietary Energy Intake - Total Caloric Intake
secondary_outcome.description: Change in caloric/energy intake (kcals/day) analyzed with related energy intake outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Dietary Energy Intake - Carbohydrate
secondary_outcome.description: Change in dietary carbohydrate intake (grams/day and grams/kg/day) analyzed with related energy intake outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Dietary Energy Intake - Fat
secondary_outcome.description: Change in dietary fat intake (grams/day and grams/kg/day) analyzed with related energy intake outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Dietary Energy Intake - Protein
secondary_outcome.description: Change in dietary protein intake (grams/day and grams/kg/day) analyzed with related energy intake outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Resting Hemodynamics - Heart Rate
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in resting heart rate (bpm) analyzed with related resting hemodynamic outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Resting Hemodynamics - Systolic Blood Pressure
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in resting systolic blood pressure (mmHg) analyzed with related resting hemodynamic outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Resting Hemodynamics - Diastolic Blood Pressure
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in resting diastolic blood pressure (mmHg) analyzed with related resting hemodynamic outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Glucose Homeostasis - Blood Glucose
secondary_outcome.description: Change in blood glucose (mg/dl) analyzed with related glucose homeostasis blood chemistry markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Glucose Homeostasis - Fasting Insulin
secondary_outcome.description: Change in fasting insulin (µIU/mL) analyzed with related glucose homeostasis blood chemistry markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Glucose Homeostasis - Homeostatic Model Assessment of Insulin Resistance
secondary_outcome.description: Change in Homeostatic Model Assessment of Insulin Resistance (Fasting insulin x Fasting glucose / 405) analyzed with related glucose homeostasis blood chemistry markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Lipid Profile - Triglyderides
secondary_outcome.description: Change in triglycerides (mg/dl) analyzed with related lipid profile blood chemistry markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Lipid Profile - Total Cholesterol
secondary_outcome.description: Change in total cholesterol (mg/dl) analyzed with related lipid profile blood chemistry markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Lipid Profile - High Density Lipoproteins
secondary_outcome.description: Change in high density lipoproteins (mg/dl) analyzed with related lipid profile blood chemistry markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Lipid Profile - Low Density Lipoproteins
secondary_outcome.description: Change in low density lipoproteins (mg/dl) analyzed with related lipid profile blood chemistry markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Lipid Profile - Total Cholesterol to HDL Ratio
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the ratio of total cholesterol to high density lipoproteins (HDL) analyzed with related lipid profile blood chemistry markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Catabolic Markers - Creatinine
secondary_outcome.description: Change in creatinine (mg/dl) analyzed with related blood chemistry catabolic markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Catabolic Markers - Blood Urea Nitrogen
secondary_outcome.description: Change in blood urea nitrogen (mg/dl) analyzed with related blood chemistry catabolic markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Catabolic Markers - Blood Urea Nitrogen to Creatinine Ratio
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the ratio of blood urea nitrogen (mg/dl) to creatinine (mg/dl) analyzed with related blood chemistry catabolic markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Catabolic Markers - Alkaline Phosphatase
secondary_outcome.description: Change in alkaline phosphatase (IU/L) analyzed with related blood chemistry catabolic markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Catabolic Markers - Alanine Amino Transaminase
secondary_outcome.description: Change in alanine amino transaminase (IU/L) analyzed with related blood chemistry catabolic markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Catabolic Markers - Aspartate Amino Transaminase
secondary_outcome.description: Change in aspartate amino transaminase (IU/L) analyzed with related blood chemistry catabolic markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Catabolic Markers - Creatine Kinase
secondary_outcome.description: Change in creatine kinase (IU/L) analyzed with related blood chemistry catabolic markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Catabolic Markers - Lactate Dehydrogenase
secondary_outcome.description: Change in lactate dehydrogenase (IU/L) analyzed with related blood chemistry catabolic markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - White Blood Cell Counts - White Blood Cells
secondary_outcome.description: Change in white blood cells (K/uL) analyzed with related white blood cell count markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - White Blood Cell Counts - Lymphocytes
secondary_outcome.description: Change in lymphocytes (K/uL) analyzed with related white blood cell count markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - White Blood Cell Counts - Mid-Range Count
secondary_outcome.description: Change in mid-range count (K/uL) analyzed with related white blood cell count markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - White Blood Cell Counts - Granulocyte
secondary_outcome.description: Change in granulocyte count (K/uL) analyzed with related white blood cell count markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Red Blood Cell Counts - Red Cells
secondary_outcome.description: Change in red cell count (M/uL) analyzed with related red blood cell count markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Red Blood Cell Counts - Hemoglobin
secondary_outcome.description: Change in hemoglobin (g/dl) analyzed with related red blood cell count markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Red Blood Cell Counts - Hematocrit
secondary_outcome.description: Change in hematocrit (%) analyzed with related red blood cell count markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Red Blood Cell Counts - Mean Corpuscular Volume
secondary_outcome.description: Change in mean corpuscular volume (fL) analyzed with related red blood cell count markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Red Blood Cell Counts - Mean Corpuscular Hemoglobin
secondary_outcome.description: Change in mean corpuscular hemoglobin (pg/cell) analyzed with related red blood cell count markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Red Blood Cell Counts - Mean Corpuscular Hemoglobin Concentration
secondary_outcome.description: Change in mean corpuscular hemoglobin concentration (g/dl) analyzed with related red blood cell count markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Red Blood Cell Counts - Red Cell Distribution Width
secondary_outcome.description: Change in red cell distribution width (%) analyzed with related red blood cell count markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Red Blood Cell Counts - Platelet Count
secondary_outcome.description: Change in platelet count (x103/uL) analyzed with related red blood cell count markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Red Blood Cell Counts - Mean Platelet Volume
secondary_outcome.description: Change in mean platelet volume (fL) analyzed with related red blood cell count markers of health via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood Chemistry Markers of Health - Appetite Hormone - Leptin
secondary_outcome.description: Change in leptin levels (ng/ml) analyzed via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (IPAQ) - Work Domain
secondary_outcome.description: Change in IPAQ work domain (MET minutes/week) analyzed with related IPAQ outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (IPAQ) - Active Transportation Domain
secondary_outcome.description: Change in IPAQ active transportation domain (MET minutes/week) analyzed with related IPAQ outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (IPAQ) - Domestic and Garden/Yard Work Domain
secondary_outcome.description: Change in IPAQ domestic and garden/yard work domain (MET minutes/week) analyzed with related IPAQ outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (IPAQ) - Leisure-Time Domain
secondary_outcome.description: Change in IPAQ leisure-time domain (MET minutes/week) analyzed with related IPAQ outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (IPAQ) - Total Physical Activity Score
secondary_outcome.description: Change in IPAQ leisure time domain (Total physical activity MET-minutes/week = sum of Total Work + Total Transport + Total Domestic and Garden + Total Leisure-Time MET-minutes/week scores) analyzed with related IPAQ outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Satiety Questionnaire - Perceptions of Appetite
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in perceptions of appetite assessed using using a 0 to 10 Likert scale (0 was none, 2.5 was low, 5 was moderate, and 7.5 was high, and 10 was severe) and analyzed with related satiety questionnaire outcomes via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Satiety Questionnaire - Perceptions of Hunger
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in perceptions of hunger assessed using using a 0 to 10 Likert scale (0 was none, 2.5 was low, 5 was moderate, and 7.5 was high, and 10 was severe) and analyzed with related satiety questionnaire outcomes via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Satiety Questionnaire - Perceptions of Satisfaction with Food
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in perceptions of satisfaction with food assessed using using a 0 to 10 Likert scale (0 was none, 2.5 was low, 5 was moderate, and 7.5 was high, and 10 was severe) and analyzed with related satiety questionnaire outcomes via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Satiety Questionnaire - Perceptions of Feelings of Fullness
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in perceptions of feelings of fullness assessed using using a 0 to 10 Likert scale (0 was none, 2.5 was low, 5 was moderate, and 7.5 was high, and 10 was severe) and analyzed with related satiety questionnaire outcomes via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Satiety Questionnaire - Perceptions of Diet / Eating Satisfaction
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in perceptions of diet / eating satisfaction assessed using using a 0 to 10 Likert scale (0 was none, 2.5 was low, 5 was moderate, and 7.5 was high, and 10 was severe) and analyzed with related satiety questionnaire outcomes via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Sleep Quality Questionnaire - Sleep Duration
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in average reported sleep duration over the prior 48 hours analyzed with related sleep quality questionnaire outcomes via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Sleep Quality Questionnaire - Sleep Quality
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in rating of sleep quality over the prior 48 hours analyzed with related sleep quality questionnaire outcomes via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Sleep Quality Questionnaire - Enthusiasm
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in rating of enthusiasm over the prior 48 hours analyzed with related sleep quality questionnaire outcomes via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Sleep Quality Questionnaire - Sleep Disturbances
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in rating of sleep disturbances over the prior 48 hours analyzed with related sleep quality questionnaire outcomes via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Perceptions of Side Effects - Dizziness
secondary_outcome.description: Change in perceptions of dizziness using a Likert scale [0 (none), 1-4 (light), 5-6 (mild), 7-9 (severe), or 10 (very severe)] and analyzed with related side effect outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Perceptions of Side Effects - Headache
secondary_outcome.description: Change in perceptions of headache using a Likert scale [0 (none), 1-4 (light), 5-6 (mild), 7-9 (severe), or 10 (very severe)] and analyzed with related side effect outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Perceptions of Side Effects - Tachycardia
secondary_outcome.description: Change in perceptions of tachycardia using a Likert scale [0 (none), 1-4 (light), 5-6 (mild), 7-9 (severe), or 10 (very severe)] and analyzed with related side effect outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Perceptions of Side Effects - Palpitations
secondary_outcome.description: Change in perceptions of palpitations using a Likert scale [0 (none), 1-4 (light), 5-6 (mild), 7-9 (severe), or 10 (very severe)] and analyzed with related side effect outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Perceptions of Side Effects - Dyspnea
secondary_outcome.description: Change in perceptions of dyspnea using a Likert scale [0 (none), 1-4 (light), 5-6 (mild), 7-9 (severe), or 10 (very severe)] and analyzed with related side effect outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Perceptions of Side Effects - Nervousness
secondary_outcome.description: Change in perceptions of nervousness using a Likert scale [0 (none), 1-4 (light), 5-6 (mild), 7-9 (severe), or 10 (very severe)] and analyzed with related side effect outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Perceptions of Side Effects - Blurred Vision
secondary_outcome.description: Change in perceptions of blurred vision using a Likert scale [0 (none), 1-4 (light), 5-6 (mild), 7-9 (severe), or 10 (very severe)] and analyzed with related side effect outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

secondary_outcome.measure: Perceptions of Side Effects - Other Side Effects
secondary_outcome.description: Change in perceptions of other side effects using a Likert scale [0 (none), 1-4 (light), 5-6 (mild), 7-9 (severe), or 10 (very severe)] and analyzed with related side effect outcome measures via General Linear Model multivariate and univariate analyses and mean changes from baseline with 95% confidence intervals (CI's).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Body Mass Index (BMI) between 25 and 34.9
Exclusion Criteria:
- Recent history of weight change (+/- 10 lbs. within the past 3 months)
- Uncontrolled metabolic disorders
- Uncontrolled cardiovascular disorders
- Currently taking prescription medications (birth control is allowed)
- Currently taking dietary supplements for weight loss
- Pregnant or plan to become pregnant
- Have an intolerance to caffeine or other natural stimulants

facility.name: Exercise & Sport Nutrition Lab - Human Clinical Research Facility

responsible_party.investigator_title: Executive Director, Human Clinical Research Facility
